data.position: Chairman of the Council of Young Scientists
data.name: Podolskyi Rostyslav Viacheslavovych
data.researchDirection: Development of a scientifically based complex of technological solutions for the production of railway rails and research of the influence of the structural state on mechanical properties ensuring high operational stability. Research of the structural state and complex of mechanical properties of products manufactured by additive production methods for application in various operational conditions.

data.position: Deputy Chairman of the Council of Young Scientists
data.name: Tsiupa Nataliia Oleksandrivna
data.researchDirection: Influence of alkalis on the properties of oxide systems and their melts. Modeling of the processes of interaction of alkaline compounds in the 'slag-metal-gas-lining' systems.
data.specialization: 05.16.02 – Metallurgy of ferrous, non-ferrous metals and special alloys.

data.name: Povorotnia Iryna Romanivna
data.researchDirection: Research of the processes of distribution and efficiency of assimilation of alloying elements in the 'metal-slag-gas' system. Improvement of technological methods for introducing additives into the metal melt to achieve their maximum degree of assimilation, improve steel quality indicators, reduce energy and raw material costs during steel smelting.
data.specialization: 05.16.02 – Metallurgy of ferrous, non-ferrous metals and special alloys.

data.position: Member of the Council of Young Scientists
data.name: Manachyn Ivan Oleksandrovych
data.description: Candidate of Technical Sciences, Senior Researcher
data.researchDirection: Research on the study of mass transfer processes during the introduction of dispersed magnesium and non-magnesium reagents into cast iron, both in the tuyere zone and in the volume of the entire melt. Participant in the industrial development and improvement of desulfurization processes.
data.specialization: 05.16.02 – Metallurgy of ferrous, non-ferrous metals and special alloys

data.name: Klemeshov Yevhen Serhiiovych
data.position: Member of the Council of Young Scientists
data.researchDirection: Mathematical modeling of metal forming processes
data.specialization: 05.03.05 – Processes and Machines of Pressure Treatment

data.position: Member of the Council of Young Scientists
data.name: Kornilov Bohdan Volodymyrovych
data.researchDirection: Development of mathematical models of thermal operation and monitoring of heat losses, lining wear of the shaft and hearth of blast furnaces, heat losses of the blast furnace, including for diagnosing disorders in the furnace operation at early stages. Improvement of existing technologies and development of new technologies (including the use of hydrogen-containing fuel) aimed at decarbonization of blast furnace production.
data.specialization: 05.16.02 – Metallurgy of ferrous, non-ferrous metals and special alloys

data.position: Member of the Council of Young Scientists
data.name: Yushkevych Pavlo Olehovich
data.researchDirection: Development of new and improvement of existing technologies and equipment for steel production in the areas of saving energy and material resources, improving quality.

data.position: Member of the Council of Young Scientists
data.name: Safronova Olena Anatoliivna
data.researchDirection: Development of scientific principles and technological solutions for new processes of railway axle production, research of the influence of the structural state and complex of properties on operational reliability.

data.position: Member of the Council of Young Scientists
data.name: Oliinyk Eduard Vadymovych
data.researchDirection: Features of the course of phase and structural transformations in carbon, alloyed and complex-alloyed steels under conditions of continuous and isothermal cooling. Development of improved technological solutions for metallurgical and metalworking enterprises, allowing for the processing of rolled products with reduced material costs.

data.position: Member of the Council of Young Scientists
data.name: Shcherbachov Vadym Rodionovych
